author: wrowe
msg: We don't actually want to compare files, here's a sequencer to
run both series utf-8 and ucs-2 in parallel and look for anomilies.

author: wrowe
msg: Solve three sets of issues, three possible changes, in one
* P64 architectures require us to use ABTS_SIZE_EQUAL
* We need to localize to TESTBINPATH for win32
* When we are done with apr_file_t's in testdup, close them

author: wrowe
msg: In preparation to be able to test multiple, parallel
flavors of the apr build, we'll need to designate the
path of the apr-invoked binaires.  Macroize this.
Also remove XXX/it's too late to make such a change
on a branch, it can only happen to trunk.

msg: Change hard Transation reference to a weak reference so TransactionContext can be garbagecollected from caches WeakHashMap in TransactionManager
